extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    FREN212 and FREN220 and Level 4 and registration in a FREN or FRLG Plan.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN351; FREN451.

basic.description: A study of representative works by African and Caribbean writers. Travaux pratiques include tests, an oral presentation and an in-depth essay. Given jointly with FREN 351/3.0.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Écrits de la francophonie
